With regards to Hillsborough's new book, I was planning on buying it  
directly from the Manhattan Kinokuniya. They first had it listed in their  computer 
that it would arrive by April 30, but the last time I went back  there (around 
two weeks ago), they said it would be available on July 30.  Apparently 
Hillsborough is in frequent contact with the store, but since he's  not publishing 
it himself, its release is delayed. Hopefully they will have it  by the end of 
this month.
 
- Anastasia
